content.description: In sentence 8 (reproduced below), the writer wants to limit the scope of the claim expressed in the sentence so that it is consistent with the main argument of the passage.
content.question: The problem with most probiotic supplements is that no significant clinical trials have proven that they offer demonstrable benefits to the general public.Which of the following changes to sentence 8 best accomplishes this goal?

choices.label: Changing “proven that they” to “been confirmed to”
Adding “that can be observed clearly” after “benefits”
Changing “the general public” to “people without gastrointestinal disorders”

content.answer: Changing “the general public” to “people without gastrointestinal disorders”

skill.text: Skill 4.C: Qualify a claim using modifiers, counterarguments, or alternative perspectives.
